titleStmt.title: A proclamacion diuised by the kynges highnes with thaduise of his most honourable counsaile, for the restraynte of shootyng in handgunnes
Proclamations. 1546
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)

publicationStmt.publisher: Tho. Berthelet regius impressor excudebat. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendu[m] solum,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Society of Antiquaries.
Appears at reels 10 and 152 (Society of Antiquaries copy).
